```{r}
case

```


```{r}
plotcord <- function(data){
  ggparcoord(data,
    columns = 1:(ncol(data)-1), groupColumn = ncol(data),
    scale="uniminmax",
     showPoints = TRUE ) +
  xlab(label = "") +
  ylab(label = "methylated values") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5, hjust=1))
}

```

```{r}
chr <- anno$Name[anno$chr == "chrY"]
data <- beta[chr,case$sample_id]

data<- as.data.frame(data)
data$status <- anno$NextBase[anno$chr == "chrY"]
data$status <- ifelse(data$status != "" ,data$status, NA)

colnames(data) <- c(as.character(case$geo_accession), "status")
plotcord(data)

```
```{r}
data <- data[!is.na(data$status),]
plotcord(data)
```
